name: Weretiger
damage_resistances: bludgeoning,piercing,and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: The weretiger makes four Claw or Scimitar attacks, or it makes four Longbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a Bite attack, provided it is in the appropriate form.

actions.name: Bite (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 8 (1d10+3) piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 13 CON save or be cursed with the weretiger lycanthropy curse (see Curse of Lycanthropy sidebar).

actions.name: Claw (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d8+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Scimitar (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d6+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The weretiger's Perception is 18 when perceiving by hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pounce (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: If the weretiger moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 STR save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the weretiger can make one Bite or Claw attack against it as a bonus action.
